it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.observe

Interface ObserveTransactionClientListener


  • public interface ObserveTransactionClientListener
    It listens for observe client events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      When the observe client terminates.

    • Method Detail

      • onObserveNotification

        void onObserveNotification(ObserveTransactionClient observe_client,
                           CoapResponseCode resp_code,
                           byte[] state,
                           int seq_num,
                           CoapResponse resp)
        When a resource change notification is received.
        Parameters:
        observe_client - the observe client
        resp_code - the response code
        state - updated representation of the new resource state
        seq_num - notification sequence number
        resp - the CoAP response message
